factor_scores.justification: 28 files to create (3 new Navigation files + 25 config/template/doc files)
factor_scores.details: 3 Navigation components, 3 config files, 3 docs, 10 template files, 3 agents, 1 script, 5 directories

factor_scores.justification: Mix of familiar (file copying, JSON config) and unfamiliar (NavigationService pattern, convention-based page resolution)
factor_scores.details: New navigation patterns for this project, but file operations are standard

factor_scores.justification: Low-medium risk: cross-platform file compatibility, template verification, no external APIs
factor_scores.details: Mostly file operations with some compilation verification; no security or data concerns

factor_scores.justification: 3+ external dependencies: .NET SDK 8.0+, jq tool, bash shell
factor_scores.details: Requires SDK for compilation tests, jq for JSON validation, bash for validation script
